summary: Fixed two critical bugs in beauty_retail_order payment hooks: 1) Changed payment_status from 'failed' to 'unpaid' in beauty_retail_order_payment_fail() to match valid enum values ['paid', 'unpaid', 'partially_paid']. 2) Fixed transaction_reference storage in beauty_retail_order_payment_success() - changed from non-existent column assignment to JSON storage in notes field, matching the booking payment handler pattern. Both fixes prevent database errors when saving retail orders.
current_status: Both bugs fixed. Retail order payment hooks now correctly handle payment status updates and transaction reference storage. No linter errors.
